forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers after midnight. Low 37F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High near 50F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 49F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Then becoming partly cloudy late. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow tapering off in the evening. Decreasing cloudiness late. Low 29F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 23F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 26F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 47F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.
